value:
select 
company_name,
actv_rec_ind,
LKP_MAXSID.MAX_SID as max_sid from
(select distinct 
cast(company_name as varchar(100)) as company_name,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind,
1 as dummy
from cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_company)src
left outer join
(select 1 as dummy, max(dim_fecu_company_key) as MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.dim_fecu_company_t) LKP_MAXSID
on src.dummy = LKP_MAXSID.dummy
